title: Requires health care service plans and health insurers to provide insurance coverage for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) testing on or after January 1, 2010
summary: Requires health care service plans and health insurers to provide insurance coverage for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) testing on or after January 1, 2010; requires coverage under family health plus.

       AN ACT to amend the insurance  law  and  the  social  services  law,  in
         relation to requiring health care service plans and health insurers to
         provide  insurance  coverage  for  human  immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
         testing

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subsection  (i)  of  section 3216 of the insurance law is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph 28 to read as follows:
    3    (28) EVERY POLICY WHICH PROVIDES HOSPITAL, SURGICAL  OR  MEDICAL  CARE
    4  COVERAGE OR PROVIDES REIMBURSEMENT FOR LABORATORY TESTS OR REIMBURSEMENT
    5  FOR DIAGNOSTIC X-RAY SERVICES SHALL PROVIDE COVERAGE FOR HUMAN IMMUNODE-
    6  FICIENCY  VIRUS  (HIV)  TESTING,  REGARDLESS  OF  WHETHER THE TESTING IS
    7  RELATED TO A PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS.
    8    S 2. Subsection (1) of section 3221 of the insurance law is amended by
    9  adding a new paragraph 18 to read as follows:
   10    (18) A GROUP OR BLANKET ACCIDENT OR HEALTH INSURANCE POLICY OR ISSUING
   11  A GROUP OR BLANKET POLICY FOR DELIVERY  IN  THIS  STATE  WHICH  PROVIDES
   12  COVERAGE  FOR  HOSPITAL,  SURGICAL, OR MEDICAL CARE COVERAGE OR PROVIDES
   13  REIMBURSEMENT FOR LABORATORY TESTS OR REIMBURSEMENT FOR DIAGNOSTIC X-RAY
   14  SERVICES SHALL PROVIDE COVERAGE FOR HUMAN IMMUNODEFICIENCY  VIRUS  (HIV)
   15  TESTING, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER THE TESTING IS RELATED TO A PRIMARY DIAG-
   16  NOSIS.
   17    S  3.  Section  4303  of  the insurance law is amended by adding a new
   18  subsection (hh) to read as follows:

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05720-01-1

       A. 2808                             2

    1    (HH) A MEDICAL  EXPENSE  INDEMNITY  CORPORATION,  A  HOSPITAL  SERVICE
    2  CORPORATION  OR A HEALTH SERVICE CORPORATION WHICH PROVIDES COVERAGE FOR
    3  HOSPITAL, SURGICAL, OR MEDICAL CARE COVERAGE OR  PROVIDES  REIMBURSEMENT
    4  FOR  LABORATORY  TESTS  OR  REIMBURSEMENT  FOR DIAGNOSTIC X-RAY SERVICES
    5  SHALL  PROVIDE  COVERAGE FOR HUMAN IMMUNODEFICIENCY VIRUS (HIV) TESTING,
    6  REGARDLESS OF WHETHER THE TESTING IS RELATED TO A PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS.
    7    S 4. Subparagraphs (xv) and (xvi) of paragraph (e) of subdivision 1 of
    8  section 369-ee of the social services law, subparagraph (xv) as  amended
    9  and  subparagraph (xvi) as added by chapter 526 of the laws of 2002, are
   10  amended and a new subparagraph (xvii) is added to read as follows:
   11    (xv) services provided to meet the requirements of 42 U.S.C. 1396d(r);
   12  [and]
   13    (xvi) hospice services[.]; AND
   14    (XVII) HUMAN IMMUNODEFICIENCY VIRUS (HIV) TESTING.
   15    S 5. This act shall take effect immediately.
